## Data

```{r}
quantiles_dvmt |>
  mutate(
    powertrain = case_when(
      powertrain == "all" ~ "All",
      powertrain == "bev" ~ "BEV",
      powertrain == "bev_non_tesla" ~ "BEV (non-Tesla)",
      powertrain == "bev_tesla" ~ "BEV (Tesla)",
      powertrain == "phev" ~ "PHEV",
      powertrain == "hev" ~ "HEV",
      powertrain == "cv" ~ "Conventional Vehicle",
      TRUE ~ powertrain
    )
  ) |>
  reactable::reactable(
    searchable = TRUE,
    highlight = TRUE,
    filterable = TRUE,
    defaultPageSize = 25,
    showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
    pageSizeOptions = c(5, 10, 15)
  )
```

:::
